Package waiting_room

Interface WaitingRoom

All Known Implementing Classes:
WaitingRoomManagement
public interface WaitingRoom

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2019 / 2020

The "contract" that identifies which operations has to be available to handle a data structure used to store Registrations

Authors:

  • @author Ricardo Santos
  • @author Bruno Oliveira
  • @author Fábio Silva
  • @author João Ramos
  • @author Óscar Oliveira

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Registration registration)
    Adds a registration to the data structure used to store registrations.
    int getFreeSeats()
    Says how many free positions exists in the data structure used to store registration
    Registration getRegistration​(java.lang.String ssn)
    Get the registration through its SSN from the registrations in the waiting room
    int getWithStatus​(RegistrationStatus registrationStatus)
    Gets the number os registrations with specified status
    void printAll()
    Prints all registrations stored in the data structure used to store registrations
    boolean remove​(Registration registration)
    Removes the registration from the data structure used to store registrations.

  • Method Details

    • getRegistration

      Registration getRegistration​(java.lang.String ssn)
      Get the registration through its SSN from the registrations in the waiting room
      Parameters:
      ssn - The patient SSN
      Returns:
      registration with the given ssn. Returns null, if not found

    • getFreeSeats

      int getFreeSeats()
      Says how many free positions exists in the data structure used to store registration
      Returns:
      The amount of free positions in the data structure used to store registrations

    • add

      boolean add​(Registration registration)
      Adds a registration to the data structure used to store registrations. The same patient can not have more than one registration in the waiting room
      Parameters:
      registration - The registration to be added
      Returns:
      true if the registration has been added, otherwise false

    • remove

      boolean remove​(Registration registration)
      Removes the registration from the data structure used to store registrations. The registration can only be removed if its status is: COMPLETE
      Parameters:
      registration - The registration to be removed
      Returns:
      true if removed, false otherwise

    • getWithStatus

      int getWithStatus​(RegistrationStatus registrationStatus)
      Gets the number os registrations with specified status
      Parameters:
      registrationStatus - The registration status to filter
      Returns:
      The number of registrations with specified status

    • printAll

      void printAll()
      Prints all registrations stored in the data structure used to store registrations
